_meanings:
{@--1@} To wake, wake
up, awaken; <ls>Ms. 1. 74</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 330.</ls>
{@--2@} To perceive, be conscious, know.

{@--1@} To awaken, rouse from
sleep; {#priyayA pratiboDyamAnamapi suptaM#} ( 
{#hatahfdayaM#}) <ls>Ś. 6. 6.</ls>

{@--2@} To inform, 

make known, acquaint with, 
communicate; {#BAvitAtmA Buvo BarturaTEnaM#} 
{#pratyaboDayat#} <ls>R. 1. 74</ls>; <ls>Śi. 6. 8.</ls>
